Summary: Bright shinning orange light pulsing slightly as it moved through the sky
trends: There have been no other sightings in Waterloo
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsAfter I came home and parked my truck for the night I turned it of and noticed a bright orange light in the sky coming from the south over auburn and heading north north east towards the Angola area. I got out of my truck and continued to watch it come towards me I pulled out my phone and got a short video of it moving through the sky, it was a brightly shinning orange light that was pulsing slightly, it made no noise as it passed over where I was at. My first thought when I saw it was that a plane was on fire and about to crash near, but i noticed that it was not losing altitude and was making no noise that I could hear at all on a silent night, this "object" was fling under the cloud cover that night. It flew a fairly straight path it turned slightly east in the sky as it was moving. As I saw it moving through the sky my first thought was that I needed to report it as an emergency so i call 911 and gave the operator the best description i could and gave her its headings in the sky as best I could until I lost sight of it in the sky due to the trees and the building i was on the other side of, it made very good time for the distance it covered in the sky for that period of time, I was slightly scared and panicked by the sight of this "object" in the sky and watched for it any other time during the night but never saw it again. I still look up in the sky where I saw it that night every time I come home and park my truck and haven't seen it again.
